recommendations: Gareth Neighbour “Akshay worked in my department for 10 weeks as an intern working on a research problem related to industry. He showed dedication, independent thinking and a level of expertise that was deeply impressive. In the short space of time, he was able to make significant progress. I would be happy top see him return to my team in the future contributing to our excellent and world class research.”
